content:
I'd be happy to help you figure out which Marvel movie you saw recently.

To help narrow down the options, can you think of any details about the movie that you remember? For example:

* Was it part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) or an X-Men movie?
* Was it a solo movie or a team-up film?
* Do you remember any specific characters, actors, or actresses in the movie?
* Was it a light-hearted, humorous movie or a more serious, dramatic one?
* Do you recall any memorable scenes, plot points, or action sequences from the movie?
* Was it a recent release (like in the past year or two) or a bit older?

Any details you can provide will help me try to identify which Marvel movie you're thinking of!
